title: Govinda's Garden Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Indian, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out
description: Denver's longest running vegetarian restaurant operating since 1985, and under new ownership since Oct 2013. New menus is 95% vegan and gluten-free. Bountiful lunch and dinner hot buffet with raw salad bar, house-made soups and organic whole wheat bread. Al la carte 'happitisers' and desserts. Organic and non GMO as much as possible. Any items containing dairy clearly indicated. Indoor and patio dining. May 2016 reported now fully vegan.
